title: Crash: NPE when trying to get error from connection
body:
My app uses Embrace for crash reporting. This is what Embrace shows:
```
java.lang.NullPointerException
com.airbnb.lottie.network.DefaultLottieFetchResult.getErrorFromConnection

0 Reader.java line 167 java.io.Reader.<init>
1 InputStreamReader.java line 76 java.io.InputStreamReader.<init>
2 Unknown Source line 8 com.airbnb.lottie.network.DefaultLottieFetchResult.getErrorFromConnection --> This is the line we have identified as most relevant to this crash.
3 Unknown Source line 77 com.airbnb.lottie.network.DefaultLottieFetchResult.error
4 Unknown Source line 89 com.airbnb.lottie.network.NetworkFetcher.fetchFromNetwork
5 Unknown Source line 34 com.airbnb.lottie.network.NetworkFetcher.fetchSync
6 SourceFile line 98 com.airbnb.lottie.LottieCompositionFactory$1.call
7 SourceFile line 95 com.airbnb.lottie.LottieCompositionFactory$1.call
8 FutureTask.java line 317 java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run
9 ThreadPoolExecutor.java line 1156 java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker
10 ThreadPoolExecutor.java line 651 java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run
11 Thread.java line 1119 java.lang.Thread.run
```

I'm using an older version of Lottie, `4.2.2.`, but I looked through the latest (`6.6.7`) and the code still allows this to happen.

Based on the crash trace, `InputStreamReader` is likely being constructed with a null `InputStream`.
